sections.content:
Good day to you all, except Heg.

You know, it's pretty nice when I go undefeated...

sections.intro: After three weeks, how are things looking?
bullets: Even though the last place idiot (me) is at **0-3**, I'm still only **two** games behind first place. So, there's that, oddly enough. Haha.
sections.outro: Let’s see how it plays out.

bullets: Cooper Kupp - Let The Force Be With Vu

pointsLeader.name: Megan
pointsLeader.notes: Megan, good job. Mixon definitely saved you this week.

dud.name: Nick
dud.notes: Heg got lucky this week because Nick was the dud.

matchups.breakdown: The story for me is that aside from Henry (23.5) doing Henry things, the Carr-Adams combo is what helped me get by in this one...
This one was a little surprising and not because I didn't think The Couple would do well...

sections.content: Some funny outtakes or randomness here.

Let The Force Be With Vu vs A Hall Lotta Love
136.04–137.05
...

As always, good luck to you all, except for Smelly.
(I hope you stub your toe.)
